resources.string: We\'ve recreated the Rail Clock to the best of our ability, but you might notice some things don\'t match up to reality.

Android widget limitations mean that it is not possible for:
  • the arrows to glide smoothly
  • the arrows to move together as the double arrows at 12:00 and 00:00
  • the numerals to use the correct font
Hopefully, you\'ll enjoy it nonetheless! The WearOS watch face does not suffer from these limitations.
